// Slide export shortcuts (macOS)
//
// Save this in USER keybindings.json (not workspace)
//
// Command + Shift + 1  → Export slides to HTML
// Command + Shift + 2  → Export slides to PDF
// Command + Shift + E  → Export slides to HTML + PDF
//
[
  {
    "key": "cmd+shift+1",
    "command": "workbench.action.tasks.runTask",
    "args": "Slides: Export2HTML (current notebook)",
    "when": "notebookEditorFocused"
  },
  {
    "key": "cmd+shift+2",
    "command": "workbench.action.tasks.runTask",
    "args": "Slides: Export2PDF (current notebook)",
    "when": "notebookEditorFocused"
  },
  {
    "key": "cmd+shift+e",
    "command": "workbench.action.tasks.runTask",
    "args": "Slides: Export HTML + PDF (current notebook)",
    "when": "notebookEditorFocused"
  },
  {
    "key": "cmd+shift+r",
    "command": "workbench.action.openWith",
    "args": {
      "viewId": "default",
      "options": {
        "openInNewGroup": false
      }
    },
    "when": "notebookEditorFocused"
  }
]
